column5: I was in BPS a few days ago looking for a bow mount trolling motor and saw for the first time a BPS brand unit.  Its has 55lbs of thrust, foot pedal that seemed user friendly and was $399 compared to a comprable Min Kota unit aprox $569.  Anybody know anything about this motor?
For the 170 your gonna save. Get a minn kota or a motorguide
